---
Title: 'User guide'
---

With the **{{cookiecutter.project_name}} plugin**, users can easily benefit from the rich set of tools of the
[HydroMT package](https://deltares.github.io/hydromt/latest/index.html) to build and update
{{cookiecutter.model_shortname}} models from available global and local data.

This plugin assists the {{cookiecutter.model_shortname}} modeller in:

- Quickly setting up a base {{cookiecutter.model_shortname}} model and default parameter values
- Making maximum use of the best available global or local data
- Adjusting and updating components of a {{cookiecutter.model_shortname}} model and their associated parameters in a consistent way

One {{cookiecutter.model_shortname}} Model classes is currently available:

- ``{{cookiecutter.model_shortname}}`` ({{cookiecutter.model_type}}): class for the {{cookiecutter.model_shortname}} model.
